TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpClientCredentialType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates the valid credential types for HTTP clients.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType%2A> to specify the type of client credential to be used for authentication.
Note that if <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode.TransportWithMessageCredential>, then the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType> is ignored.
## Examples The following code shows how to set <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType%2A> to a member of this enumeration.
[!code-csharp[c_ProgrammingSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_programmingsecurity/cs/source.cs#11)] [!code-vb[c_ProgrammingSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_programmingsecurity/vb/source.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType Basic = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies Basic authentication. For more information, see [RFC 2617 – HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Authentication](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType Certificate = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies client authentication using a certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType Digest = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies Digest authentication. For more information, see [RFC 2617 – HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Authentication](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=95943).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType InheritedFromHost = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The authentication is inherited from the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType Ntlm = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType Windows = int32(4)
